subject: Unable to access premium features
content: I upgraded to premium yesterday but I still can't access the advanced features. My payment went through successfully.

subject: Bulk discount inquiry
content: We're interested in purchasing 100+ licenses for our organization. Do you offer bulk discounts?

subject: API rate limit issues
content: We're hitting rate limits even though we're well below our quota. This is affecting our production environment.

subject: How do I export my data?
content: I need to export all my data for compliance reasons. Can you guide me through the process?

subject: TERRIBLE SERVICE - WANT REFUND NOW
content: This is the worst service I've ever used! Nothing works properly. I demand a full refund immediately!

subject: Feature request: Webhook support
content: It would be great if you could add webhook support for real-time notifications. This would really help with our integration.

subject: Invoice payment failed
content: We received a notification that our payment failed. We updated our credit card information. Please retry the payment.

subject: Getting started help
content: I just signed up and I'm a bit lost. Could someone help me understand how to get started with the platform?

subject: Security audit questionnaire
content: As part of our vendor assessment, we need you to complete the attached security questionnaire. This is required for compliance.

subject: Partnership opportunity
content: We'd like to discuss a potential partnership to integrate your service into our platform. We have 50k+ active users who could benefit.
